Lost In Worlds
by Nihirash
Updated 2018-06-12

Little platformer made with Platform Game Designer. 
Explore strange worlds and back home!

Controls:
O,P - Direction
SPACE - Jump


Feel free to redistribute game!
This game made for real Zx-Spectrum or emulator! Emulator doesn't bounded with game!
On 128K models, please, boot from 48K or USR0 mode! 

https://nihirash.itch.io/lost-in-worlds
